Potion, legendary
This dark, grainy liquid tastes positively awful. Anyone imbibing the elixir gains permanent resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and gains a damage threshold of 5, but their speed is reduced by 10 feet and they always make Dexterity saving throws and Dexterity ability checks with disadvantage that canâ€™t be overcome or canceled out by any means.
Ingredients. The core of an iron golem, a shard of purest adamantine, and the powdered teeth of a mountain giant.
